description: Definitions of buttons in Stock Tools GUI.

children.name: buttons
children.description: A collection of strings pointing to config options for the toolbar items. Each name refers to unique key from definitions object.

children.name: className
children.description: A CSS class name to apply to the stocktools' div, allowing unique CSS styling for each chart.

children.name: definitions
children.description: An options object of the buttons definitions. Each name refers to unique key from buttons array.

children.name: iconsURL
children.description:
Path where Highcharts will look for icons. Change this to use icons from a different server.

Since 7.1.3 use iconsURL for popup and stock tools.

children.name: toolbarClassName
children.description: A CSS class name to apply to the container of buttons, allowing unique CSS styling for each chart.
